content: in next double_crochet* round round 8 -1dc in each double_crochet round 9 -*1dc in next 3 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet* round rounds 10 & 11 -1dc in each double_crochet round 12 -*1dc in next 4dc 2dc in next double_crochet* round article ideas page 1 body of hat rounds 13 to 22 -1dc in each double_crochet round 23 -join next colour jaeger aqua #316 ruby 1dc in each double_crochet round rounds 24 to 34 -1dc in each double_crochet round 35 -join next colour rowan glace #445 blood orange 1dc in each double_crochet round brim of hat round 36 -*1dc in next 5 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet* round rounds 37 & 38 -1dc in each double_crochet round 39 -*1dc in next 6 double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet* round rounds 40 to 49 -1dc in each double_crochet on last stitch 1dc into the next double_crochet one row belowfor a neat join then fasten_off sew in ends on the inside and pull out marker article ideas page 2
